plot outline: The movie revolves around Gangsters, Love and Police. The movie is inspired and made on real incidents which happened in late 70's and early 80's. It's about the gang and their love interest. The fight between Police and the gangsters shown in a very different way. And what happens to the gang and their love interest is the surprise element.
title: Jindaa
